<li class="expanded menu-mlid-2216 dropdown"><a href="/people/faculty-and-affiliates" title="" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" data-target="#">People <span class="caret"></span></a><ul class="dropdown-menu"><li class="first leaf has-children menu-mlid-2214"><a href="/people/faculty-and-affiliates" title="">Faculty and Affiliates</a></li>
<li class="leaf menu-mlid-2220"><a href="/people/postdoctoral" title="">Post Doctoral</a></li>

</ul></li>
<li class="expanded menu-mlid-2778 dropdown"><a href="/events/upcoming-events" title="" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" data-target="#">Events <span class="caret"></span></a><ul class="dropdown-menu"><li class="first leaf menu-mlid-2848"><a href="https://sites.stanford.edu/anthro/events/upcoming-events" title="">Upcoming Events</a></li>
<li class="leaf menu-mlid-2145"><a href="/events/brown-bag-series" title="Brown Bag series">Brown Bag</a></li>

</ul></li>

  <div id="main" class="clearfix main" role="main">
  	        <div class="container">
            <div id="main-content" class="row main-content">
                <div id="content" class="mc-content span9">
          <div id="content-wrapper" class="content-wrapper">
            <div id="content-head" class="row-fluid content-head">
                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Anthropology Graduate Program </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-139" class="node node-stanford-landing-page stanford-4-col-header clearfix" about="/graduate-program" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="Anthropology Graduate Program" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="field field-name-field-landing-page-item field-type-field-collection field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div  about="/field-collection/field-landing-page-item/302" typeof="" class="ds-1col entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-landing-page-item view-mode-stanford_4_col_header clearfix">

  
  <div class="well"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2>Doctoral Program</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/doctoral-program"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/4-col-header/public/campus-scene13_4.jpg?itok=AlvJ_T_8" width="370" height="140" alt="" /></a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-description field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Ph.D. program allows students to develop a flexible program reflecting special research interests, under the supervision of a faculty committee chosen by the student. Students are encouraged to plan for completion of all work for the Ph.D. in five years.<br /><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/doctoral-program">» see Doctoral Program</a></p>
</div></div></div><div class="more-link"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/doctoral-program">Doctoral Program</a></div></div></div></div></div></div>

</div><div class="field-item odd"><div  about="/field-collection/field-landing-page-item/324" typeof="" class="ds-1col entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-landing-page-item view-mode-stanford_4_col_header clearfix">

  
  <div class="well"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2>Master Degree Program</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/master-degree-program"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/4-col-header/public/campus-scene7_0.jpg?itok=PgpCVkme" width="370" height="140" alt="" /></a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-description field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The purpose of the Master of Arts degree program is to further develop knowledge and skills in Anthropology and to prepare students for a professional career or doctoral studies.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="more-link"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/master-degree-program">Master Degree Program</a></div></div></div></div></div></div>

</div><div class="field-item even"><div  about="/field-collection/field-landing-page-item/326" typeof="" class="ds-1col entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-landing-page-item view-mode-stanford_4_col_header clearfix">

  
  <div class="well"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2>Graduate Degree Program Tracks</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/graduate-program-tracks"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/4-col-header/public/campus-scene10_0.jpg?itok=hsvh7Nrt" width="370" height="140" alt="" /></a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-description field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Students may pursue two different tracks in the Anthropology Ph.D. degree program. The tracks are not declarable in AXESS; they do not appear on the transcript or the diploma. The two tracks are: 1) Culture and Society and 2) Archaeology.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="more-link"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/graduate-program-tracks">Graduate Degree Program Tracks</a></div></div></div></div></div></div>

</div><div class="field-item odd"><div  about="/field-collection/field-landing-page-item/304" typeof="" class="ds-1col entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-landing-page-item view-mode-stanford_4_col_header clearfix">

  
  <div class="well"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2>Admissions</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/graduate-admission"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/4-col-header/public/campus-scene11_0.jpg?itok=JoU3xEw5" width="370" height="140" alt="" /></a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-description field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Graduate Admissions season is open beginning in September each year for applications to be submitted by the published deadline in December.<br /><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/admission/doctorate-and-terminal-master-program" rel="nofollow">Doctoral and Masters Degree Program » </a><br /><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/admissions/coterminal" rel="nofollow">Coterminal Masters Degree Program » </a></p>
</div></div></div><div class="more-link"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/graduate-admission">Admissions</a></div></div></div></div></div></div>

</div><div class="field-item even"><div  about="/field-collection/field-landing-page-item/308" typeof="" class="ds-1col entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-landing-page-item view-mode-stanford_4_col_header clearfix">

  
  <div class="well"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2>Courses</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://explorecourses.stanford.edu/search?view=catalog&amp;catalog=&amp;page=0&amp;q=ANTHRO&amp;filter-catalognumber-ANTHRO=on&amp;filt"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/4-col-header/public/campus-scene6_0.jpg?itok=dCKAxYGa" width="370" height="140" alt="" /></a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-description field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Look up Anthropology courses.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="more-link"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://explorecourses.stanford.edu/search?view=catalog&amp;catalog=&amp;page=0&amp;q=ANTHRO&amp;filter-catalognumber-ANTHRO=on&amp;filt">Courses</a></div></div></div></div></div></div>

</div><div class="field-item odd"><div  about="/field-collection/field-landing-page-item/310" typeof="" class="ds-1col entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-landing-page-item view-mode-stanford_4_col_header clearfix">

  
  <div class="well"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2>GSO</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/anthropology-graduate-student-organization"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/4-col-header/public/campus-scene4_0.jpg?itok=Br-bfgUj" width="370" height="140" alt="" /></a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-description field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Anthropology Graduate Student Organization advocates for graduate students within Stanford’s Anthropology department and the university as a whole.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="more-link"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/anthropology-graduate-student-organization">GSO</a></div></div></div></div></div></div>

</div><div class="field-item even"><div  about="/field-collection/field-landing-page-item/312" typeof="" class="ds-1col entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-landing-page-item view-mode-stanford_4_col_header clearfix">

  
  <div class="well"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2>Forms &amp; References</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://sites.stanford.edu/anthro/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/4-col-header/public/campus-scene5_0.jpg?itok=vTuJpI5b" width="370" height="140" alt="" /></a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-description field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Download various graduate forms and reference documents.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="more-link"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://sites.stanford.edu/anthro/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references">Forms &amp; References</a></div></div></div></div></div></div>

</div><div class="field-item odd"><div  about="/field-collection/field-landing-page-item/328" typeof="" class="ds-1col entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-landing-page-item view-mode-stanford_4_col_header clearfix">

  
  <div class="well"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2>Intra- and Extra-Mural Funding</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/intra-and-extra-mural-funding"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/4-col-header/public/campus-scene2_0.jpg?itok=3SaeLjhb" width="370" height="140" alt="" /></a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-description field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Anthropology graduate and undergraduate students have a number of opportunities to apply for grants and fellowships at a variety of stages during an academic career.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="more-link"><div class="field field-name-field-s-lp-item-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/intra-and-extra-mural-funding">Funding Resources</a></div></div></div></div></div></div>

</div></div></div>  </div>
    </article> </div>
</div></div>

<li>Schedule a meeting: <a href="http://www.meetme.so/shellycoughlan" target="_blank">http://www.meetme.so<br />/shellycoughlan</a></li>

  <div id="block-menu-block-1" class="clearfix block block-menu-block plinks">     <h2>Main menu</h2>

  <div id="main" class="clearfix main" role="main">
  	        <div class="container">
            <div id="main-content" class="row main-content">
                <div id="content" class="mc-content span12">
          <div id="content-wrapper" class="content-wrapper">
            <div id="content-head" class="row-fluid content-head">
                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> About Anthropology Graduate Program </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-137" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/graduate-program/about" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="About Anthropology Graduate Program" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="postcard"><div class="postcard-image group_s_postcard_image"><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-s-image-info field-type-field-collection field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-stanford-large-scaled field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-s-image-info clearfix" about="/field-collection/field-s-image-info/71" typeof="">
  <div class="content">
    <div class="border-simple-nowidth border-shadow"><div class="field field-name-field-s-image-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/large-scaled/public/Outdoor_classroom_0.png?itok=n6Q12eMX" width="270" height="180" alt="Students holding class outdoors" /></div></div></div></div><div class="caption"><div class="field field-name-field-s-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Students meet for their course section outdoors on a nice day.</p>
</div></div></div></div>  </div>
</div>
</div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="postcard-content"><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Graduate training in Anthropology at Stanford is designed for students who seek the Doctoral of Philosophy (Ph.D.) degree, and for students who seek the Masters of Arts (M.A.) degree, only.</p>
<h3 name="text">Graduate Learning Outcomes</h3>
<p>The purpose of the Master of Arts degree program is to further develop knowledge and skills in Anthropology and to prepare students for a professional career or doctoral studies. This is achieved through completion of courses in the primary field, as well as related areas, and through experience with independent work, area specialization and field research.</p>
<p>The Ph.D. is conferred upon candidates who have demonstrated substantial scholarship and the ability to conduct independent research and analysis in Anthropology. Through completion of advanced course work and rigorous skills training, the Doctoral degree program prepares students to make original contributions to the knowledge of Anthropology and to interpret and present the results of such research.</p>
<ol><li><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/about/about-archaeology-track">Archaeology;</a></li>
<li><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/about/about-cultural-and-social-track">Culture and Society </a></li>
</ol><p>Download the Department of Anthropology Graduate Program Flyer and the Department of Anthropology Graduate Handbook for information concerning the Anthropology Graduate degree programs. These references can be found on the  <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references">Graduate Forms and References page</a>.</p>
<p>For more detailed description of the Anthropology Master of Arts Program, see Department of Anthropology <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-programs/about/master-program">About the Master of Arts Program</a> and the <a href="http://exploredegrees.stanford.edu/schoolofhumanitiesandsciences/anthropology/#masterstext">Stanford University Bulletin Explore Degrees </a>.</p>
<p>For more detailed description of the Anthropology Doctor of Philosophy Program, see Department of Anthropology <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-programs/about/doctoral-program">About the Doctor of Philosophy Program</a> and the <a href="http://exploredegrees.stanford.edu/schoolofhumanitiesandsciences/anthropology/#doctoraltext">Stanford University Bulletin Explore Degrees</a>.</p>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>
    </article> </div>
</div></div>
 <!-- /.region -->
  </div>

        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last views-article">

</div> </div>

                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Page Not Found  </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-79" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/node/79" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="Page Not Found " class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="postcard"><div class="postcard-content"><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><h2>Please email the <a href="mailto:ebishop1@stanford.edu">webmaster</a> and describe how you got to this page.  Thank you.</h2>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>

</div></div>

<div id="block-menu-menu-footer-academics-menu" class="clearfix block block-menu span2">     <h2>Research</h2>
      <div class="content"> <ul class="menu nav"><li class="first leaf"><a href="/research-projects/research-projects-region" title="">Research Projects by Region and by Topic</a></li>

</div>

            <div id="content-head" class="row-fluid content-head">
                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Page Not Found  </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-79" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/node/79" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="Page Not Found " class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="postcard"><div class="postcard-content"><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><h2>Please email the <a href="mailto:ebishop1@stanford.edu">webmaster</a> and describe how you got to this page.  Thank you.</h2>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>
    </article> </div>
</div></div>
 <!-- /.region -->

  <div id="block-menu-block-stanford-jsa-layouts-1" class="clearfix block block-menu-block">     <h2>Graduate Program</h2>
      <div class="content"> <div class="menu-block-wrapper menu-block-stanford_jsa_layouts-1 menu-name-main-menu parent-mlid-0 menu-level-2">
  <ul class="menu nav"><li class="first leaf menu-mlid-1215"><a href="/graduate-program" title="">Graduate Program Overview</a></li>

<li class="last leaf menu-mlid-2502"><a href="/graduate-programs/about/doctoral-program/phd-minor-program">Ph.D. Minor Program</a></li>
</ul></li>
<li class="collapsed menu-mlid-1245"><a href="/graduate-program/master-degree-program">Master Degree Program</a></li>
<li class="leaf menu-mlid-2822"><a href="/graduate-program/graduate-program-tracks">Tracks within Graduate Program</a></li>
<li class="collapsed menu-mlid-1251"><a href="/graduate-program/graduate-admission">Admission</a></li>
<li class="leaf menu-mlid-2109"><a href="https://explorecourses.stanford.edu/search?view=catalog&amp;catalog=&amp;page=0&amp;q=ANTHRO&amp;filter-catalognumber-ANTHRO=on&amp;filt" title="menu link directs people to anthropology courses on Stanford Bulletin Explore Courses site">Courses</a></li>
<li class="collapsed menu-mlid-3142"><a href="/graduate-program/anthropology-graduate-student-organization">Graduate Student Organization</a></li>
<li class="leaf menu-mlid-1255"><a href="/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references" title="">Graduate Forms and References</a></li>
<li class="last collapsed menu-mlid-1253"><a href="/graduate-program/intra-and-extra-mural-funding" title="">Intra- and Extra-Mural Funding</a></li>
</ul></div>
 </div>
</div>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- /#sidebar-first -->
                <div id="content" class="mc-content span9">
          <div id="content-wrapper" class="content-wrapper">
            <div id="content-head" class="row-fluid content-head">
                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Fifth Year PhD Program At-a-Glance </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-898" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/graduate-program/about/doctoral-program/fifth-year-glance" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="Fifth Year PhD Program At-a-Glance" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="postcard"><div class="postcard-content"><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><div class="at-a-glance">
<h3>AUTUMN</h3>
<p>	<strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>AR ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss</li>
<li>CS ANTHRO 400 Dissertation Writers Seminar</li>
<li>ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Pre-doctoral Research Affiliateship; Teaching Assistantship</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Optional:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Submit the Department Request for Incidental funding on or by 15 June in the first year.</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Complete the Teaching Assistantship requirement</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Bay Area Residency</li>
<li>Enroll in ANTHRO 400. Dissertation Writers Seminar and attend 4 of 5 Sessions of the Diss Writers Seminar each quarter in the Autumn, Winter and Spring quarters</li>
<li>-Serve as a Teaching Assistant during one or more quarters in one or more 50% time/20 hours each week assignments</li>
<li>Apply to Extramural or Intramural funding sources for Dissertation writing in the following academic year</li>
<li>Submit a fifth year dissertations writers report of dissertation progress to completion form by the last day of finals weeks in the Autumn, Winter and Spring quarters of the fifth year.</li>
<li>Review the Department Informed Agreement for Funding Support</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss '0' units</li>
<li>ANTHRO 400 Diss Writers Seminar 1-3 units</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<p>Central or Other:</p>
<p>Department: [download department forms at <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references">Graduate Forms and References</a>]</p>
<ul><li data-canvas-width="247.69939553333336">Informed agreement for funding support</li>
<li data-canvas-width="186.9543126">Request for Incidental Funding</li>
</ul><p>Registrar:</p>
<p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>WINTER</h3>
<p>	<strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>AR ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss</li>
<li>CS ANTHRO 400 Dissertation Writers Seminar</li>
<li>ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Pre-doctoral Research Affiliateship; Teaching Assistantship</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Complete the Teaching Assistantship requirement</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Bay Area Residency</li>
<li>Enroll in ANTHRO 400. Dissertation Writers Seminar and attend 4 of 5 Sessions of the Diss Writers Seminar each quarter in the Autumn, Winter and Spring quarters</li>
<li>Serve as a Teaching Assistant during one or more quarters in one or more 50% time/20 hours each week assignments</li>
<li>Apply to Extramural or Intramural funding sources for Dissertation writing in the following academic year</li>
<li>Submit a fifth year dissertations writers report of dissertation progress to completion form by the last day of finals weeks in the Autumn, Winter and Spring quarters of the fifth year.</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss '0' units</li>
<li>ANTHRO 400 Diss Writers Seminar 1-3 units</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong> none</p>
<p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>SPRING</h3>
<p>	<strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>AR ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss</li>
<li>CS ANTHRO 400 Dissertation Writers Seminar</li>
<li>ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Pre-doctoral Research Affiliateship; Teaching Assistantship</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Complete the Teaching Assistantship requirement</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Bay Area Residency</li>
<li>Enroll in ANTHRO 400. Dissertation Writers Seminar and attend 4 of 5 Sessions of the Diss Writers Seminar each quarter in the Autumn, Winter and Spring quarters</li>
<li>Serve as a Teaching Assistant during one or more quarters in one or more 50% time/20 hours each week assignments</li>
<li>Apply to Extramural or Intramural funding sources for Dissertation writing in the following academic year</li>
<li>Submit a fifth year dissertations writers report of dissertation progress to completion form by the last day of finals weeks in the Autumn, Winter and Spring quarters of the fifth year.</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss '0' units</li>
<li>ANTHRO 400 Diss Writers Seminar 1-3 units</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong> none</p>
<p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>SUMMER</h3>
<p>	<strong>Courses:</strong> <strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>no Department funding given</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Milestones:</strong> <strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Apply to Extramural or Intramural funding sources for Dissertation writing in the following academic year</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Zero units; no enrollment required</li>
</ul><p>	<strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<p>Central or Other:</p>
<p>Department:</p>
<p>Registrar:</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://axess.stanford.edu" target="_blank">https://axess.stanford.edu</a></li>
</ul><p> </p>
</div>
<p> </p>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>
    </article> </div>
</div></div>
 <!-- /.region -->
  </div>

                <div id="content" class="mc-content span9">
          <div id="content-wrapper" class="content-wrapper">
            <div id="content-head" class="row-fluid content-head">
                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Fourth Year PhD Program At-a-Glance </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-896" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/graduate-program/about/doctoral-program/fourth-year-glance" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="Fourth Year PhD Program At-a-Glance" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="postcard"><div class="postcard-content"><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><div class="at-a-glance">
<h3>AUTUMN</h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Both Tracks‐ANTHRO 450 Research Apprenticeship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Pre‐doctoral Research Affiliateship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Optional:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Submit the Department Request for Incidental funding on or by 15 June in the first year.</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Submit quarterly reports of time to degree and field research status</li>
<li>Review the Department Informed Agreement for Funding Support</li>
<li>Submit the Request for Terminal Graduate Registration Status on or by the first day of Autumn quarter in the fourth year. The form can be given to the Student Services Officer during the Spring or Summer quarters in the third year to submit on behalf of the student to the University Registrar.</li>
</ul><p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>If TGR status is not yet confirmed ('0' units), then 10 units, only</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<p>Central or Other:</p>
<p>Department: [download department forms at <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references">Graduate Forms and References]</a></p>
<ul><li>Quarterely Reports of degree progress (email message format)</li>
<li>Informed agreement for funding support</li>
<li>Request for Incidental Funding</li>
</ul><p>Registrar:</p>
<ul><li>Request for Terminal Graduate Reqistration Status which can be downloaded at: <a href="https://stanford.app.box.com/v/tgrreq" target="_blank">https://stanford.app.box.com/v/tgrreq</a></li>
</ul><p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>WINTER</h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Both Tracks‐ANTHRO 450 Research Apprenticeship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Pre‐doctoral Research Affiliateship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<p>		<strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Submit quarterly reports of time to degree and field research status</li>
</ul><p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>If TGR status is not yet confirmed ('0' units) then 10 units only</li>
</ul><p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>SPRING</h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Both Tracks‐ANTHRO 450 Research Apprenticeship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Pre‐doctoral Research Affiliateship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Submit quarterly reports of time to degree and field research status</li>
</ul><p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>If TGR status is not yet confirmed ('0' units), then 10 units, only</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<p>Central or Other:</p>
<p>Department:</p>
<ul><li>Quarterely Reports of degree progress (email message format)</li>
</ul><p>Registrar:</p>
<p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>SUMMER</h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>No funding provided</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Zero units; no enrollment required (no tuition given)</li>
</ul></div>
<p> </p>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>
    </article> </div>
</div></div>
 <!-- /.region -->

                <div id="content" class="mc-content span9">
          <div id="content-wrapper" class="content-wrapper">
            <div id="content-head" class="row-fluid content-head">
                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Sixth Year Plus At-a-Glance (PhD Program) </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-900" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/graduate-program/about/doctoral-program/sixth-year-plus-glance" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="Sixth Year Plus At-a-Glance (PhD Program)" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="postcard"><div class="postcard-content"><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><div class="at-a-glance">
<h3>AUTUMN</h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Both Tracks ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss (if funded)</li>
</ul><p><strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Extramural or other Intramural</li>
<li>ANTHRO Teaching Affiliateship by request</li>
<li>-ellowship stipend for the following expenses:</li>
<li>Health Services Fee, Vaden Health Insurance, Cardinal Care Graduation Quarter tuition ($100.00)</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Approved Final Draft of the Dissertation</li>
<li>Oral Examination Dissertation Defense</li>
<li>Graduation</li>
</ul><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Apply to Graduate in Axess (if funded)</li>
<li>Enroll if graduating (and if funded)</li>
<li>Request a University Graduation Quarter, if graduating and funded</li>
<li>At least four weeks prior to the proposed date for the Oral Examination Dissertation Defense, submit the Oral Examination Schedule form to the ANTHRO Graduate Committee (if funded)</li>
<li>At least four weeks prior to the proposed date for the Oral Examination Dissertation Defense, submit the final draft of the Dissertation to the Dissertation Reading Committee (if funded)</li>
</ul><p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>ANTHRO 802 TGR Diss '0' units, if graduating (and if funded)</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<p>Central or Other:</p>
<p>Department:</p>
<p>Registrar:</p>
<ul><li>University Oral Examination.  See <a href="http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/registrar/files/doc_orals.pdf" target="_blank">http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/registrar/files/doc_orals.pdf</a></li>
<li>Petition for Graduation Quarter.  See <a href="http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/registrar/files/grad_qtr.pdf" target="_blank">http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/registrar/files/grad_qtr.pdf</a></li>
</ul><p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>WINTER</h3>
<p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>SPRING</h3>
<p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<p> </p>
</div>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>
    </article> </div>
</div></div>
 <!-- /.region -->
  </div>

                <div id="content" class="mc-content span9">
          <div id="content-wrapper" class="content-wrapper">
            <div id="content-head" class="row-fluid content-head">
                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Third Year PhD Program At-a-Glance </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-894" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/graduate-program/about/doctoral-program/third-year-glance" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="Third Year PhD Program At-a-Glance" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="postcard"><div class="postcard-content"><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><div class="at-a-glance">
<h3>AUTUMN</h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Both Tracks-ANTHRO 444 Colloquium</li>
<li>ANTHRO 451 Directed Individual Study</li>
</ul><p><strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li data-canvas-width="57.574984">Fellowship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Optional:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Submit the Department Request for Incidental funding on or by 15 June in the first year.</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Confirm the Dissertation Reading Committee on or by the first day of finals week in Autumn Quarter of the third year.</li>
</ul><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Confirm the Qualifying Examination Committee Readers for Area and Topic on or by the last day of the third week in Autumn quarter of the third year.</li>
<li>Submit three approved dissertation improvement funding (ie NSF-like) proposals to the agency by the published deadline on or by the first day of finals week in Autumn quarter of the third year.</li>
<li>Review the Department Informed Agreement for Funding Support</li>
</ul><p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Full time 11-18 (15 minimum), ANTHRO 451 Directed Individual Study under the section of the Dissertation Reading Committee Advisor</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Central or Other:</li>
<li>Department: [Download department forms at <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references">Graduate Forms and References</a>]
<ul><li>Informed agreement for funding support</li>
<li>Request for Incidental Funding</li>
</ul></li>
<li>Registrar:
<ul><li>Dissertation Reading Committee.  See <a href="https://stanford.app.box.com/v/docdiss-reading-committee-form" target="_blank">https://stanford.app.box.com/v/docdiss-reading-committee-form</a></li>
<li>Petition for Non-Academic Council Doctoral Committee Members.  See <a href="https://stanford.app.box.com/v/doc-ctte-non-acad-council" target="_blank">https://stanford.app.box.com/v/doc-ctte-non-acad-council</a></li>
</ul></li>
</ul><p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3><strong>WINTER</strong></h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Both Tracks-ANTHRO 444 Colloquium , ANTHRO 401A Qualifying Examination for TOPIC, ANTHRO 401B Qualifying Examination for AREA</li>
</ul><p><strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Fellowship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Complete each Qualifying Examination; Receive a Satisfactory grade on or by the first day of finals week in Winter quarter of the third year.</li>
</ul><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Confirm Schedule: Date ranges and start time for the Qualifying Examinations on or by the last day of the third week in Winter quarter of the third year.</li>
<li>Complete approved Qualifying Examination Bibliographies on or by the first day of the finals week in Winter quarter of the third year.</li>
<li>Submit preliminary Qualifying Examination Bibliographies to the respective committee members on or by last day of the third week in Winter quarter of the third year.</li>
</ul><p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Full time 11-18 (15 minimum)</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Central or Other:</li>
<li>Department:
<ul><li>Qualifying Examination Status form which can be downloaded at <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references">Graduate Forms and References</a></li>
</ul></li>
<li>Registrar:</li>
</ul><p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>SPRING</h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Both Tracks-ANTHRO 444 Colloquium</li>
<li>ANTHRO 450 Research Apprenticeship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Funding:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Pre-doctoral Research Affiliateship</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Confirm an approved Dissertation Proposal on or by the first day of finals weekin Spring quarter of the third year.</li>
</ul><div><strong>Requirements:</strong></div>
<ul><li>Schedule a meeting with the Dissertation Reading Committee for review of the Dissertation Proposal on or by the May 15 in Spring quarter of the third year.</li>
<li>Confirm an approved Non-medical human Subjects Protocol before arrival to the field.</li>
<li>Submit the Request for Terminal Graduate Registration Status on or by the first day of Autumn quarter in the fourth year.</li>
<li>The form can be given to the Student Services Officer during the Spring or Summer quarters in the third year to submit on behalf of the student to the University Registrar.</li>
</ul><p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>10 units, only</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Central or Other:
<ul><li>IRB E Protocol.  See <a href="http://humansubjects.stanford.edu/new/resources/researchers/nonmed-application.html" target="_blank">http://humansubjects.stanford.edu/new/resources/researchers/nonmed-application.html</a></li>
</ul></li>
<li>Department:</li>
<li>Registrar:
<ul><li>Request TGR Status.  See <a href="http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/registrar/files/tgrreq.pdf" target="_blank">http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/registrar/files/tgrreq.pdf</a></li>
</ul></li>
</ul><p style="border-bottom:1px solid #a6a6a6"> </p>
<h3>SUMMER</h3>
<p><strong>Courses:</strong></p>
<ul><li>No enrollment requirement</li>
</ul><p><strong>Milestones:</strong></p>
<p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p>
<p><strong>Units:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Zero units; no enrollment require</li>
</ul><p><strong>Forms:</strong></p>
<ul><li>Central or Other:</li>
<li>Department:</li>
<li>Registrar:</li>
</ul><p> </p>
</div>
<p> </p>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>
    </article> </div>
</div></div>
 <!-- /.region -->
  </div>

<div id="block-block-14" class="clearfix block block-block border-simple-nowidth border-shadow descriptor newblock">     <h2>Contact Information</h2>
      <div class="content"> <p><img src="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/cabin_in_forest.jpg" alt="cabins in the forest" width="300" height="115" /></p>
<p><span style="font-weight:500;">University Registrar office of Graduate Admissions</span><br />
E-mail: <a href="mailto:gradadmissions@stanford.edu">gradadmissions@stanford<br />.edu</a></p>
<p><span style="font-weight:500;">Department of Anthropology</span><br />
E-mail: <a href="mailto:anth_gradadmission@stanford.edu">anth_gradadmission<br />@stanford.edu</a><br />
Address: Department of Anthropology<br />
450 Serra Mall, Main Quadrangle,<br />
Building 50, Room 51G<br />
Stanford, CA 94305-2034</p>
 </div>
</div>

                <div id="content" class="mc-content span9">
          <div id="content-wrapper" class="content-wrapper">
            <div id="content-head" class="row-fluid content-head">
                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> Graduate Degree Programs: MA and PhD  </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-135" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/graduate-program/admission/graduate-degree-programs-ma-and-phd" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="Graduate Degree Programs: MA and PhD " class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="postcard"><div class="postcard-content"><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><h3>Apply</h3>
<p>To apply to graduate degree programs in the Department of Anthropology, please go to the University Registrar, Graduate Admissions web page located at <a href="http://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/applying">http://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/applying</a>.</p>
<p>For Additional Information about applying to Stanford University, go to:</p>
<ul><li><a href="http://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/">Stanford University Registrar Office of Graduate Admissions</a> for information about graduate admission. Please review the <a href="http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/gradadmissions/faq">FAQ</a> provided by the Registrar.</li>
	<li><a href="http://bulletin.stanford.edu/">Stanford University Bulletin</a> for information about university requirements, degree program requirements and course offerings.</li>
	<li>Anthropology Graduate Degrees Program Flyer for information about the department’s graduate degree programs. See the latest copy of Anthropology Graduate Degree Program Flyer on the <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/department/forms-and-documents/graduate-forms-and-references">Forms and Documents</a> page or refer to the Quick Links section on this page.</li>
	<li><a href="https://anthropology.stanford.edu/graduate-program/admission/faq/faq-anthropology-graduate-program" rel="nofollow">Department of Anthropology Graduate Admission FAQ</a> for information about the department's graduate admission process, programs, and application</li>
</ul><h3>Application Deadline: Tuesday, December 5, 2017</h3>
<p>The graduate application submission deadline for the 2017-2018 academic year is Tuesday, December 5, 2017 at 9:00pm (PST). The application must be submitted and all required supporting documents, including official transcript(s), letters of recommendation, and ETS official GRE/TOFEL scores, must be received by the published deadline. Incomplete applications may not be considered.</p>
<h3>Department Application Requirements</h3>
<ol><li>Submission of the Stanford University Electronic <a href="http://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/">Graduate Admissions Application</a> (for PhD and terminal MA applications only) by the published deadline. Please review the information and instructions, for accessing the electronic application, via the Stanford University Graduate Admissions webpages located at <a href="http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/gradadmissions">http://studentaffairs.stanford.edu/gradadmissions</a>. To choose an Anthropology graduate degree program, search for the Department of Anthropology in the School of Humanities and Sciences.</li>
	<li>Submission of the Writing Sample detailing evidence of both writing ability, the capacity for research, analysis, original thought at the graduate level, and demonstration of the ability to use theory in relation to evidence. Please submit a 4,500-5,400 word paper, via electronic pdf file upload directly to the electronic graduate application. If electronic submission is not possible, please send an email message to <a href="https://web.stanford.edu/dept/anthropology/cgi-bin/web/anth_gradadmission@stanford.edu">anth_gradadmission@stanford.edu</a> explaining the circumstance and make a request for an alternate method of electronic submission.</li>
	<li>Submission of all cited transcripts, via electronic .pdf file upload directly to the electronic graduate application. In addition to uploading a scanned copy of the transcript, applicants must arrange to have two official transcripts sent from every post-secondary institution attended, for at least one academic year, as a full-time student. NOTE: An official transcript is one that is received directly from the issuing institution that bears the official seal and signature of the institution, representing its validity. See <a href="https://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/applying/starting-your-application/required-application-documents/transcripts-academic-records-0">https://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/applying/starting-your-application/required-application-documents/transcripts-academic-records-0</a>.</li>
	<li>Submission of required test scores by way of the Educational Testing Service (ETS) listing the Stanford University Institutional code: 4704 (there is no department or school code, only the University code)
		<ul><li>GRE General test is required for all national and foreign national applicants. There is no requirement for a specific GRE Subject test.</li>
			<li>TOEFL for all foreign national applicants (please see the information listed at University <a href="https://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/applying/frequently-asked-questions">Registrar Office of Graduate Admissions</a> for exceptions)</li>
		</ul></li>
	<li>Submission of a statement of purpose detailing academic and professional preparation for the Anthropology graduate degree program. Please submit a 900-1,350 word paper, via electronic pdf file upload directly to the electronic graduate application.</li>
	<li>Submission of three letters of recommendation, only. Please review the University Registrar Office of Graduate Admissions instructions for submission of the letters of recommendation. Important - Letters must be submitted electronically by each recommender. <strong>A private letter/credentialing service is not permitted</strong>. If electronic submission is not possible, please send an email message to <a href="mailto:anth_gradadmission@stanford.edu" rel="nofollow">anth_gradadmission@stanford.edu</a> explaining the circumstance and with a request for alternate method of electronic submission. All letters should be received by the published deadline. It is the applicant’s responsibility to communicate with each recommender to ensure that the department’s deadline for submission of the electronic graduate application will be met.</li>
</ol><h3>Requesting Department Evaluation for MA Degree if not admitted to the PhD Degree Program</h3>
<p>Although requesting department evaluation for MA if not accepted to PhD is an option provided in the University Graduate Application, the Department of Anthropology does not offer this option. Students should apply separately to either the PhD or the MA degree program in Anthropology. The department reserves the right to offer admission to an applicant for the MA or PhD regardless of the desired program stated in the Graduate Application.</p>
<h3>Status Information</h3>
<p>Check the status of an application (e.g. letters of recommendation received, official ETS test scores, etc.) by logging into the application account Activity Log. Each graduate admission season decision status information will be available by early March. The selection of Ph.D. students admitted to the Department of Anthropology is based on an individualized, holistic review of each application, including (but not limited to) the applicant's academic record, the letters of recommendation, the scores on both the General GRE (Graduate Record Examination) and the GRE Subject test, the statement of purpose, personal qualities and characteristics, and past accomplishments.</p>
<h3>Process Information</h3>
<p>The selection of PhD students admitted to the Department of Anthropology is based on an individualized, holistic review of each application, including (but, not limited to) the applicant's academic record, the letters of recommendation, the scores on the General GRE (Graduate Record Examination), the statement of purpose, personal qualities and characteristics, and past accomplishments.</p>
<h3>Special Programs at Stanford University</h3>
<h4>Knight-Hennessy Scholars Program</h4>
<p>The <a href="https://knight-hennessy.stanford.edu/">Knight-Hennessy Scholars</a> program is designed to build a multidisciplinary community of Stanford graduate students dedicated to finding creative solutions to the world's greatest challenges.<em> Each year, t</em>his University-endowed Scholars Program awards up to 100 high-achieving Graduate students with  funding to pursue a Graduate education at Stanford. To be considered for admission to the Department of Anthropology MA or PhD degree program as a Knight-Hennessy Scholar, one must apply to Knight-Hennessy Scholars via <a href="https://knight-hennessy.stanford.edu/admission/apply-now">https://knight-hennessy.stanford.edu/admission/apply-now</a> by September 27, 2017; and, apply to Stanford University, Department of Anthropology, Graduate degree program via<a href="https://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/applying"> https://gradadmissions.stanford.edu/applying</a>.  Although, the Department of Anthropology published deadline for submission of the Graduate application is December 5, 2017, only those applicants who have submitted a Knight-Hennessy Scholar application by September 27, 2017; and, who have also submitted a Graduate application to the Department of Anthropology on or by November 15, 2017 are eligible for consideration of graduate admission status to the MA or PhD in Anthropology as a Knight Hennessy Scholar.</p>
<h4>Medical Scientist Training Program</h4>
<p>MSTP application in conjunction with social science PhD programs is only permitted for current Stanford MD students previously admitted to a social science PhD program, through their PhD application process.</p>
<p>Stanford MD students admitted to a Social Science PhD Program may apply for MSTP funding through the <a href="http://med.stanford.edu/mstp/admissions/internaladmissions.html">MSTP internal admissions process.</a> For more information, please go to http://med.stanford.edu/mstp/admissions.html</p>
<h3>Contact Information</h3>
<p><em><span>University Registrar Office of Graduate Admissions Contact Information:</span></em><br />
	Web page: <a href="https://gradadmissions.stanford.edu">https://gradadmissions.stanford.edu</a><br />
	E-mail: <a href="mailto:%20gradadmissions@stanford.edu" rel="nofollow">gradadmissions@stanford.edu</a></p>
<p><em><span>Department of Anthropology Contact Information:</span></em><br />
	Web page: <a href="https://anthropology.stanford.ed" rel="nofollow">https://anthropology.stanford.edu</a><br />
	E-mail: <a href="mailto:%20anth_gradadmission@stanford.edu" rel="nofollow">anth_gradadmission@stanford.edu</a></p>
<p><em>Mailing Address:</em><br />
	Department of Anthropology<br />
	450 Serra Mall, Main Quadrangle, Building 50, Room 51G<br />
	Stanford, CA 94305-2034</p>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>
    </article> </div>
</div></div>

                                                        <h1 class="title" id="page-title"> FAQ for Anthropology Graduate Program  </h1>
                                                                                                </div>
                                                <div id="content-body" class="row-fluid content-body"> <div class="region region-content clearfix">
  <div id="block-system-main" class="clearfix block block-system">       <div class="content"> <article id="node-914" class="node node-stanford-page clearfix" about="/graduate-program/admission/faq/faq-anthropology-graduate-program" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">      <span property="dc:title" content="FAQ for Anthropology Graduate Program " class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    <div class="content">
    <div class="field field-name-field-res-by-topic field-type-list-boolean field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div>  </div>
